verses.verse: And it shall come to pass <S%H1697><s%>, when all these things are come <S%H935><s%> upon thee <S%H1293><s%>, the blessing and the curse <S%H7045><s%>, which I have set <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee <S%H7725><s%>, and thou shalt call them to mind <S%H3824><s%> among all the nations <S%H1471><s%>, whither Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath driven thee <S%H5080><s%>,

and shalt return <S%H7725><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, and shalt obey <S%H8085><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%> according to all that I command <S%H6680><s%> thee this day <S%H3117><s%>, thou and thy children <S%H1121><s%>, with all thy heart <S%H3824><s%>, and with all thy soul <S%H5315><s%>;

that then Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> will turn <S%H7725><s%> thy captivity <S%H7622><s%>, and have compassion <S%H7355><s%> upon thee <S%H7725><s%>, and will return and gather <S%H6908><s%> thee from all the peoples <S%H5971><s%>, whither Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath scattered thee <S%H6327><s%>.

If any of thine outcasts <S%H5080><s%> be in the uttermost <S%H7097><s%> parts of heaven <S%H8064><s%>, from thence will Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> gather <S%H6908><s%> thee <S%H3947><s%>, and from thence will he fetch thee:

and Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> will bring <S%H935><s%> thee into the land <S%H776><s%> which thy fathers <S%H1><s%> possessed <S%H3423><s%>, and thou shalt possess <S%H3423><s%> it <S%H3190><s%>; and he will do thee good, and multiply <S%H7235><s%> thee above thy fathers <S%H1><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> will circumcise <S%H4135><s%> thy heart <S%H3824><s%>, and the heart <S%H3824><s%> of thy seed <S%H2233><s%>, to love <S%H157><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> with all thy heart <S%H3824><s%>, and with all thy soul <S%H5315><s%>, that thou mayest live <S%H2416><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> will put <S%H5414><s%> all these curses <S%H423><s%> upon thine enemies <S%H341><s%>, and on them that hate <S%H8130><s%> thee <S%H7291><s%>, that persecuted thee.

And thou shalt return <S%H7725><s%> and obey <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> all his commandments <S%H4687><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> thee this day <S%H3117><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> will make thee plenteous <S%H3498><s%> in all the work <S%H4639><s%> of thy hand <S%H3027><s%>, in the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy body <S%H990><s%>, and in the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy cattle <S%H929><s%>, and in the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy ground <S%H127><s%>, for good <S%H2896><s%>: for Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will again <S%H7725><s%> rejoice <S%H7797><s%> over thee for good <S%H2896><s%>, as he rejoiced <S%H7797><s%> over thy fathers <S%H1><s%>;

if thou shalt obey <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, to keep <S%H8104><s%> his commandments <S%H4687><s%> and his statutes <S%H2708><s%> which are written <S%H3789><s%> in this book <S%H5612><s%> of the law <S%H8451><s%>; if thou turn <S%H7725><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> with all thy heart <S%H3824><s%>, and with all thy soul <S%H5315><s%>.
For this commandment <S%H4687><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> thee this day <S%H3117><s%>, it is not too hard <S%H6381><s%> for thee <S%H7350><s%>, neither is it far off.

It is not in heaven <S%H8064><s%>, that thou shouldest say <S%H559><s%>, Who shall go up <S%H5927><s%> for us to heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and bring <S%H3947><s%> it unto us <S%H8085><s%>, and make us to hear it <S%H6213><s%>, that we may do it?

Neither is it beyond <S%H5676><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%>, that thou shouldest say <S%H559><s%>, Who shall go <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5676><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> for us <S%H3947><s%>, and bring it unto us <S%H8085><s%>, and make us to hear it <S%H6213><s%>, that we may do it?
But the word <S%H1697><s%> is very <S%H3966><s%> nigh <S%H7138><s%> unto thee <S%H6310><s%>, in thy mouth, and in thy heart <S%H3824><s%>, that thou mayest do it <S%H6213><s%>.
See <S%H7200><s%>, I have set <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee this day <S%H3117><s%> life <S%H2416><s%> and good <S%H2896><s%>, and death <S%H4194><s%> and evil <S%H7451><s%>;

in that I command <S%H6680><s%> thee this day <S%H3117><s%> to love <S%H157><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, to walk <S%H3212><s%> in his ways <S%H1870><s%>, and to keep <S%H8104><s%> his commandments <S%H4687><s%> and his statutes <S%H2708><s%> and his ordinances <S%H4941><s%>, that thou mayest live <S%H2421><s%> and multiply <S%H7235><s%>, and that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> may bless <S%H1288><s%> thee in the land <S%H776><s%> whither thou goest <S%H935><s%> in to possess it <S%H3423><s%>.

But if thy heart <S%H3824><s%> turn away <S%H6437><s%>, and thou wilt not hear <S%H8085><s%>, but shalt be drawn away <S%H5080><s%>, and worship <S%H7812><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>, and serve them <S%H5647><s%>;

I denounce <S%H5046><s%> unto you this day <S%H3117><s%>, that ye shall surely <S%H6><s%> perish <S%H6><s%>; ye shall not prolong <S%H748><s%> your days <S%H3117><s%> in the land <S%H127><s%>, whither thou passest over <S%H5674><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> to go <S%H935><s%> in to possess it <S%H3423><s%>.

I call <S%H5749><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth <S%H776><s%> to witness <S%H5749><s%> against you this day <S%H3117><s%>, that I have set <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee life <S%H2416><s%> and death <S%H4194><s%>, the blessing <S%H1293><s%> and the curse <S%H7045><s%>: therefore choose <S%H977><s%> life <S%H2416><s%>, that thou mayest live <S%H2421><s%>, thou and thy seed <S%H2233><s%>;

to love <S%H157><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, to obey <S%H8085><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%>, and to cleave <S%H1692><s%> unto him <S%H2416><s%>; for he is thy life, and the length <S%H753><s%> of thy days <S%H3117><s%>; that thou mayest dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H127><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> sware <S%H7650><s%> unto thy fathers <S%H1><s%>, to Abraham <S%H85><s%>, to Isaac <S%H3327><s%>, and to Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, to give them <S%H5414><s%>.
